description:
Greasy trails are no fun with the wrong tires. Engineered for slippery and soft surfaces, the Wild AM2 keeps you planted when dropping into loamy chutes and mucky berms.

  • GUM-X rubber uses a single compound that balances rolling efficiency and grip
  • Tread optimized for soft loamy trails and mud
  • Large blocks improve handling and braking on loose and slippy terrain
  • Gravity Shield 3x60 TPI casing for increased puncture resistance without sacrificing ride comfort
  • Tubeless ready
name: Michelin Wild AM2 Competition 27.5x2.4 Tire
